resources.string: 1. Maximum of 50 multiple choice questions will be asked.
2. Questions are divided into three categories Easy, Medium and Hard.

3.Test starts with medium question. The next questions difficulty relies on the answer of current question. Correct answer increases difficulty whereas incorrect answer decreases difficulty if possible.
4. With every single question the standard error and users ability measure are calculated.
5. The test stops if no more easier or harder questions remains, ability measure has became precise enough, maximum number of questions has been attempted and time has ended(ie 45 minutes).
6. Answer once choosen can not be changed afterward.
7. At the end you will receive estimated ability level, total score and overall feedback on your performance.
8. Ensure you have a stable internet connection through out the test
9. Complete the test with your own knowledge. The system is designed to help you realize your knowledge or ability and improve it.
